name: Infect Man
description:
A couple of students doing a gamejam and thinking of cool stuff!
The Gameplay

Use the WASD keys or the left joystick of a controller to move!
Try and infect as many tiles as possible by bumping into them!

The Idea

Imagine you are a little virusspreader and you've managed to get into the body of a person. You have traveled high and far, because of that you've ended up in the person's lungs. Now granted you are a virus, so what do you do? Exactly! Spread your 'message'!

Travel through multiple veins in the person's body and try to infect as much ground as possible! This mechanic also decides the eventual highscore of the player. During the gameplay antibodies will try and 'cure' you. As we've said, there is a highscore mechanic. This prototype has a very survival-like type of gameplay and based on the time you've survived and how much you've infected a highscore gets generated.
